{"data": [{"id":"6012266","name":"Grand Opening","source":"https://i.imgur.com/RcMVWoY.jpg","description":"WELCOME! Like to cordially invite you to our grand opening of our new clothing store right here in Missisauga. Everyone is invited and look forward to seeing you there!","location":"Missisauga","date":"07/04/2018" }, {"id":"5573808","name": "Pizza Party","source": "https://i.imgur.com/qf0bfiq.jpg","description": "Do you love pizza? Well if you do then join us! We will be hosting a pizza party and would love for you to come!","location": "Vaughan","date": "06/06/2018"}, {"id":"5951281","name": "Music Concert","source": "https://i.imgur.com/70CtLkw.jpg","description": "Come and enjoy the best of our performances! There will be live performances by The Script and you can find out more about them here. http://www.thescriptmusic.com/home","location": "Markham","date": "06/02/2018"}, {"id":"3754545","name": "Soccer Championship","source": "https://i.imgur.com/rfikyjf.jpg","description": "Its the grand finals of the Soccer Championship we were all waiting for! Sign up quickly before admission closes!","location": "Vaughan","date": "07/10/2018"}, {"id":"8345849","name": "24/7 Night Club","source": "https://i.imgur.com/dluDJVs.jpg","description": "Its time to party at the best club ever! 24/7 Night club is back with the biggest night of our history! Be there or be square!","location": "Brampton","date": "07/12/2018"}, {"id":"2178093","name": "Book Club","source": "https://i.imgur.com/F9pOB76.jpg","description": "Do you enjoy reading? Well our book club is the perfect place for you! Come join us on our official first meeting date below!","location": "Toronto","date": "04/21/2018"}, {"id":"1631403","name": "End of Year Party","source": "https://i.imgur.com/KSXUmtY.jpg","description": "Its time to celebrate the end of school! Get your tickets before they run out!","location": "Vaughan","date": "05/22/2018"}, {"id":"4568144","name": "Bar Hangout","source": "https://i.imgur.com/AULCk64.jpg","description": "If you are looking for a chance to just relax and drink some beer with some friends? Look no further! Its time to sit back, relax, and talk about anything while drinking some beer!","location": "Brampton","date": "06/09/2018"}, {"id":"4225342","name": "Pool Party","source": "https://i.imgur.com/IMPWGwC.jpg","description": "Summer is nearly here! You know the best way to celebrate that? POOL PARTY! Lets have fun!","location": "Vaughan","date": "04/22/2018"}, {"id":"8628284","name": "Art Gallery","source": "https://i.imgur.com/Fd0iHuF.jpg","description": "We are opening our first art gallery here in Markham. Come and witness some exquisite art for a small fee!","location": "Markham","date": "07/17/2018"}, {"id":"3608419","name": "Baseball Game","source": "https://i.imgur.com/xEkFTGV.jpg","description": "The Jays are playing the Tigers and I know you do not want to miss any of the action! Buy your tickets now! https://www1.ticketmaster.ca/toronto-blue-jays-vs-detroit-tigers-toronto-ontario-06-29-2018/event/10005335AA19354C","location": "Toronto","date": "06/29/2018"}, {"id":"1778927","name": "Bike Tour","source": "https://i.imgur.com/fS5dFp3g.jpg","description": "We are having one of our first bike tours right here in Missisauga. If you like biking and would like to join then sign up!","location": "Missisauga","date": "05/10/2018"}, {"id":"6840122","name": "Movie Night","source": "https://i.imgur.com/ByfgB8I.png","description": "Its movie night! Come join us and watch any movie you would like for a discounted price! https://www.cineplex.com/Theatre/Galaxy-Cinemas-Barrie","location": "Barrie","date": "05/25/2018"}, {"id":"4624633","name": "Comedy Show","source": "https://i.imgur.com/4cTownY.jpg","description": "Its time to laugh until your belly bursts! Come join us and witness some of the best comedians Toronto has to offer! https://www.yukyuks.com/?action=club.showDetails","location": "Toronto","date": "05/16/2018"}, {"id":"5116939","name": "A.I. Conference","source": "https://i.imgur.com/cKzW73X.jpg","description": "Its time to experiment with the newest technology the world has to offer in the A.I. field! Reserve your ticket now so you do not miss out on a fantastic conference like this!","location": "Missisauga","date": "06/01/2018"}, {"name": "Toronto Coffee and Tea Expo","description": "Toronto, you REALLY love your coffee and tea! That’s why we’re celebrating our extraordinary culture for the second year in a row. 

Contest Rules and Regulations Below 

The Toronto Coffee and Tea Expo pays tribute to the talents and passion of this buzzing community, all under one roof! We are passionate about bringing together the top local talent infused with international flavours, offering guests the chance to experience a wide variety of tea, coffee, and complementary goods. 

 So you’re hooked on hot beverages - here’s why the Toronto Coffee and Tea Expo is for you:

- Free drink samples 
- Discover new beans, leaves and recipes 
- International and exotic flavours 
- Coffee varietals like you’ve never seen before 
- Learn industry tips and tricks from some of the community’s finest
- Become your own barista with beans and leaves for purchase 
- Immerse yourself in our vibrant cafe culture
- Take part in our interactive workshops, like TIY (Tea It Yourself) and espresso making

Come and celebrate with us on April 14th and 15th from 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM at Evergreen Brickworks! 

 To ensure a smooth and timely entry, there are two entry times each day (before 2pm and after 2pm). Attendees are welcome to stay as long as they like!","id": "5ac6b007a4cb37e37d7beaff","source": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/37/Nice_Cup_of_Tea.jpg","location": "Toronto","date": "05/16/2018"}, {"id": "5ac6b007be30ace75c573156","name": "Toronto Poutine Fest","description": "Toronto's first Poutine Fest! Yonge-Dundas Square to try some of Canada's best food trucks and over 50 varieties of gourmet poutine. http://www.poutinefestontour.com/ ","source": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/6c/Poutine.JPG/220px-Poutine.JPG","location": "Toronto","date": "05/16/2018"}, {"id": "5ac6b00734c84528315bab62","name": "Battle Chinatown 2018 Final - Fuuunkiest 2018","description": "Just Feel it Toronto Presents:
2018 Fuuunkiest Toronto Street Dance Festival
Battle Chinatown 2018 Final
https://www.justfeelittoronto.com/2018-fuuunkiest","source": "https://i.ytimg.com/vi/HVnP9Roy0wo/hqdefault.jpg","location": "Toronto","date": "06/23/2018"}]}
